channel.title: Capital Market - Live News
channel.description: Latest market news and updates from Capital Market

item.title: Acme Solar Holdingsâ€™ arm inks 190 MW wind-solar hybrid PPA
item.description: Acme Solar Holdings said that its wholly owned subsidiary, ACME Urja One has signed a power purchase agreement (PPA) with Solar Energy Corporation (SECI) to set up 190 MW hybrid power project. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Dhabriya Polywood spurts after arm bags Rs 25-cr orders from Godrej Group
item.description: Dhabriya Polywood zoomed 9.12% to Rs 404 after it has announced that its wholly owned subsidiary, Dynasty Modular Furnitures, has received letters of intent (LOIs) from the Godrej Group aggregating to Rs 25.30 crore. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Atishay jumps on securing Rs 34 lakh order from Government of Maharashtra
item.description: Atishay jumped 3.25% to Rs 187.70 after it has secured a domestic work order from the State Health Assurance Society (SHAS), Government of Maharashtra. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: RVNL rises after bagging Rs 1,201-cr bridge contract from Northern Railway
item.description: Rail Vikas Nigam (RVNL) rose 1.13% to Rs 312.14 after the company received a letter of acceptance (LoA) from Northern Railway for a project worth Rs 1,201.35 crore. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Indices edge lower in early trade; breadth positive
item.description: Indices edge lower in early trade; breadth positive Category: Market Commentary - Mid-Session

item.title: Coforge Ltd Spurts 2.4%
item.description: Coforge Ltd has lost 16.92% over last one month compared to 8.29% fall in BSE Teck index and 2.18% rise in the SENSEX Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: GIFT Nifty suggests green opening for equities; Fed minutes show officials divided on interest rate outlook
item.description: GIFT Nifty suggests green opening for equities; Fed minutes show officials divided on interest rate outlook Category: Market Commentary - Pre-Session

item.title: Stock Alert: B. L. Kashyap and Sons, Pace Digitek, DCX Systems, Bharat Electronics
item.description: Stock Alert: B. L. Kashyap and Sons, Pace Digitek, DCX Systems, Bharat Electronics Category: Market Commentary - Stock Alert

item.title: Pace Digitek arm bags order worth $1.35 mln from overseas entity
item.description: Pace Digitek announced that its material subsidiary, Lineage Power has secured a purchase order worth $ 1.35 million from Yaqin Chem of Saudi Arabia, to supply mobile battery energy storage system (BESS). Category: Hot Pursuit
